name: Fire SURVIVAL:Battle of Squad
description:
Fire SURVIVAL:Battle of Squad is a survival fps game. You can create your squad and go to battlefield. Its huge battlefield and stay alive against to enemies. You can create your battle strike royal room 30 players can play with your. Enter the battleground and get weapons. Show your skills. Its real action shooter fps game.
Features:
• Explore the vast Environment.
• Multiple FPS Mission.
• The battle against the unknown enemies.
• Startling 3D Graphics & Sound Effects
